text: We don't know about you guys, but we're total suckers for a good cooking competition. When done right, it's the perfect blend of high - stakes competition, seriously tough challenges, delicious - looking food and, of course, a dash of drama. And Food Network Star has it all â€” plus two hosts with some real chemistry. Don't believe us? Go watch a bloopers reel of Giada De Laurentiis and Bobby Flay ; we'll wait. When all is said and done and a winner is crowned, if you're anything like us, you likely reach for your phone the second the finale ends, typing ` ` what's ( season winner name ) doing now'' or ` ` ( season winner name ) Instagram'' in the Google
